verses.text: Woe to her that is filthy and polluted , to the oppressing city !\f + \fr 3.1 \ft her…: or, gluttonous: Heb. craw\f*
She obeyed not the voice ; she received not correction ; she trusted not in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; she drew not near to her God.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft correction: or, instruction\f*
Her princes within her \add are\add* roaring lions ; her judges \add are\add* evening wolves ; they gnaw not the bones till the morrow.
Her prophets \add are\add* light \add and\add* treacherous persons : her priests have polluted the sanctuary , they have done violence to the law.

The just \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* in the midst thereof; he will not do iniquity : every morning doth he bring his judgment to light , he faileth not; but the unjust knoweth no shame.\f + \fr 3.5 \ft every…: Heb. morning by morning\f*

I have cut off the nations : their towers are desolate ; I made their streets waste , that none passeth by : their cities are destroyed , so that there is no man , that there is none inhabitant.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft towers: or, corners\f*

I said , Surely thou wilt fear me, thou wilt receive instruction ; so their dwelling should not be cut off , howsoever I punished them: but they rose early , \add and\add* corrupted all their doings. \p

¶ Therefore wait ye upon me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, until the day that I rise up to the prey : for my determination \add is\add* to gather the nations , that I may assemble the kingdoms , to pour upon them mine indignation , \add even\add* all my fierce anger : for all the earth shall be devoured with the fire of my jealousy.

For then will I turn to the people a pure language , that they may all call upon the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to serve him with one consent.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft language: Heb. lip\f*\f + \fr 3.9 \ft consent: Heb. shoulder\f*
From beyond the rivers of Ethiopia my suppliants , \add even\add* the daughter of my dispersed , shall bring mine offering.

In that day shalt thou not be ashamed for all thy doings , wherein thou hast transgressed against me: for then I will take away out of the midst of thee them that rejoice in thy pride , and thou shalt no more be haughty because of my holy mountain.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft because…: Heb. in my holy\f*
I will also leave in the midst of thee an afflicted and poor people , and they shall trust in the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The remnant of Israel shall not do iniquity , nor speak lies ; neither shall a deceitful tongue be found in their mouth : for they shall feed and lie down , and none shall make \add them\add* afraid. \p
¶ Sing , O daughter of Zion ; shout , O Israel ; be glad and rejoice with all the heart , O daughter of Jerusalem.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath taken away thy judgments , he hath cast out thine enemy : the king of Israel , \add even\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add is\add* in the midst of thee: thou shalt not see evil any more.
In that day it shall be said to Jerusalem , Fear thou not: \add and to\add* Zion , Let not thine hands be slack.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft slack: or, faint\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God in the midst of thee \add is\add* mighty ; he will save , he will rejoice over thee with joy ; he will rest in his love , he will joy over thee with singing.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft rest: Heb. be silent\f*

I will gather \add them that are\add* sorrowful for the solemn assembly , \add who\add* are of thee, \add to whom\add* the reproach of it \add was\add* a burden.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft reproach…: Heb. the burden upon it was reproach\f*

Behold, at that time I will undo all that afflict thee: and I will save her that halteth , and gather her that was driven out ; and I will get them praise and fame in every land where they have been put to shame.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft get…: Heb. set them for a praise\f*\f + \fr 3.19 \ft where…: Heb. of their shame\f*

At that time will I bring you \add again\add*, even in the time that I gather you: for I will make you a name and a praise among all people of the earth , when I turn back your captivity before your eyes , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
